title: CALL KINGS WAY YOUR NEW SWEET HOME!!!!!
posting_body: Kingsway Apartments is the place to call home!
CALL TODAY!
show contact info
Located just minutes from the Las Vegas Strip, you'll be at the center of it all at Kingsway Apartments!
World-class shopping, wonderful dining, local schools, commuter-friendly freeways, and exciting recreations are all just minutes away.
Our 1 bedroom 1 bathroom apartments are heated and provide air conditioning.
Each unit comes with carpet, an oven range, and a refrigerator.
Enjoy the community’s courtyard and swimming pool.
We also have laundry facilities and on-site parking.
Thanks to the nearby Fashion Show Mall you’ll have many shopping, dining, and entertainment options at your fingertips.
Enjoy all the amenities and convenient location for a price that meets your needs.
Schedule a tour with us today and experience a Virtual Tour like no other!
Look and see what our community has to offer and what you have been missing!
We are here for you and your family during these difficult times.
The way to stay safe is safer at home!
Amenities:
• Air Conditioner
• Swimming Pool
• Laundry Facilities
Location:
2700 Kings Way
Las Vegas, NV 89102
Rental Information:
Application Fee $55 + Holding Fee
$250* | Lease Terms 12 months
*A $250.00 holding fee applies to secure a unit of the requested size.
Upon approval, holding deposits are applied to move-in charges and are generally refundable if not approved, but certain terms and conditions apply.
Additional details available on application.
<URL>/
Westland Real Estate Group is a family-owned company that features 30 multi-family communities throughout Las Vegas.
With over 10,000 units in the area, we offer everything from studios to three-bedroom townhomes, with a variety of in-demand amenities.
Enjoy stress-free living in our well-maintained communities with clean grounds and professional staff.
At Westland, you’ve found a place where you can invest in your future.
